oracle.mapviewer.share.style
Interface StyleModel

All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractBucketStyleModel, AbstractStyleModel, AreaStyleModel, BarChartStyleModel, BucketStyleModel, CollectionStyleModel, ColorSchemeStyleModel, ColorStyleModel, DotDensityStyleModel, HeatMapStyleModel, LineStyleModel, MarkerStyleModel, PieChartStyleModel, TextStyleModel, VariableMarkerStyleModel, VariablePieChartStyleModel
public interface StyleModel
extends java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable

State model of a style.

Method Detail

getTypeName

java.lang.String getTypeName()
Returns the style type name (AREA, COLOR, LINE, MARKER, TEXT, ADVANCED, TTF).

Returns:
String - style type

toXMLString

java.lang.String toXMLString()
This method, when implemented by an extended class, creates a string that contains the XML representation of this style bean. This XML document can then be saved to the DEFINITION column of the USER_SDO_STYLES table.

Returns:
String - an XML string containing the definition of this style

setType

void setType(int type)
Sets the style type code. STYLE_COLOR = 1; STYLE_MARKER = 2; STYLE_LINE = 3; STYLE_AREA = 4; STYLE_TEXT = 5; STYLE_ADVANCED = 9; STYLE_TTF = 99;

Parameters:
type -
